p: MDA, MCF-7, PANC-1, and normal human fibroblast cell lines were provided by Hamdi Mango Centre for Scientific Research, University of Jordan. All the cells were grown in a humidified 5% CO 2 atmosphere incubated at 37 Â°C and in DMEM high glucose (Euroclone, S.p.A) containing 10% FBS (fetal bovine serum), 10 g/L penicillin-streptomycin, and 10 g/L l-glutamine.
